page.title: 08THE VILLAGE - Education
page.content:
Three full-time members of staff are employed at the school together with part-time visiting teachers of fabric craft, physical education, music, and remedial education. (Figures correct for July 1985)
The children follow a varied and interesting curriculum for their statutory seven years of primary school education prior to transferring to secondary school, normally North Berwick High School. In 1985, when this survey was compiled the school possessed 3 BBC Model B microcomputers and various useful peripheral pieces of equipment and had achieved a certain regard for its development work in cross-curricular use of the micro.
